title: Why do you play up and hype announcements about movies coming to town when during Wilmingtin\'s hey day there were 4 or 5 movies being filmed at the same time.Is it because we all know but don\'t want to admit it but Wilmington and all of N.C. is finished making movies?
text:
Your question is not appropriate for MyReporter.com. It has been
forwarded to Features Editor John Staton, though.
